arts.ttl: Eredivisie Round up: PSV lose again as Van Persie’s Feyenoord debut ends in draw
arts.sum: There were four matches in the Eredivisie on Saturday and below is a round up of all the action. Utrecht 1-0 NAC Breda FC Utrecht finally ended their winless run in the Eredivisie with a narrow win over NAC Breda. arts.ttl: Van Persie appointed head coach of Feyenoord
arts.sum: Former Arsenal and Manchester United striker Robin van Persie is appointed the new head coach of Feyenoord.
